title: 'Opening the gates of hell’: Activists fear Musk will revive banned accounts
description: A Twitter poll posted by Elon Musk shows 72 percent support granting “general amnesty” to accounts suspended for harassment, abuse and misinformation.

title: FTX’s Bahamas crypto empire: Stimulants, subterfuge and a spectacular collapse
description: Sam Bankman-Fried's image of monkish aloofness met reality in the Bahamas, where the 30-year-old crypto billionaire lived in a guarded island compound, with every need closely catered to and the world’s elite at his beck and call.

title: Meet the world’s first astronaut with a disability: Paralympian John McFall
description: Bronze-winning British paralympian John McFall will join the European Space Agency program to test how people with disabilities can live and work in outer orbit.

title: Sam’s Club’s AI knows how much pumpkin pie you’ll eat this holiday
description: The artificial intelligence uses a wide variety of data, like local temperatures and whether the Sunday football game is home or away.
